import React from 'react'; const TrainersSection: React.FC = () => { const trainers = [ { id: 1, name: 'Rajesh Kumar', role: 'Senior DevOps Engineer', company: 'Amazon Web Services', experience: '8+ years', expertise: ['AWS', 'Kubernetes', 'Docker', 'Terraform'], image: 'üë®‚Äçüíª', bio: 'Ex-AWS engineer with expertise in cloud architecture and container orchestration. Has trained 200+ professionals.', linkedin: '#', github: '#' }, { id: 2, name: 'Priya Sharma', role: 'Platform Engineer', company: 'Microsoft', experience: '6+ years', expertise: ['Azure', 'DevOps', 'CI/CD', 'Monitoring'], image: 'üë©‚Äçüîß', bio: 'Microsoft certified trainer specializing in Azure cloud services and DevOps practices. Passionate about mentoring.', linkedin: '#', github: '#' }, { id: 3, name: 'Amit Patel', role: 'Site Reliability Engineer', company: 'Google', experience: '7+ years', expertise: ['GCP', 'Prometheus', 'Grafana', 'SRE'], image: 'üë®‚Äçüè≠', bio: 'Google SRE with deep knowledge of monitoring, observability, and reliability engineering practices.', linkedin: '#', github: '#' }, { id: 4, name: 'Neha Singh', role: 'Cloud Architect', company: 'IBM', experience: '9+ years', expertise: ['Multi-Cloud', 'Architecture', 'Security', 'Networking'], image: 'üë©‚Äçüíº', bio: 'Enterprise cloud architect with expertise in designing scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud solutions.', linkedin: '#', github: '#' }, { id: 5, name: 'Vikram Reddy', role: 'DevOps Lead', company: 'Netflix', experience: '5+ years', expertise: ['Microservices', 'GitLab CI/CD', 'Jenkins', 'Ansible'], image: 'üë®‚Äçüíº', bio: 'Netflix DevOps lead specializing in CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation. Loves sharing knowledge.', linkedin: '#', github: '#' }, { id: 6, name: 'Anjali Desai', role: 'Infrastructure Engineer', company: 'Uber', experience: '6+ years', expertise: ['Infrastructure as Code', 'Linux', 'RHEL', 'Shell Scripting'], image: 'üë©‚Äçüíª', bio: 'Infrastructure expert with deep knowledge of Linux systems and automation. Trained 150+ students successfully.', linkedin: '#', github: '#' } ]; return (
